schedule(int, Object, Method, Object...) - Static method in class aor.spells.Scheduler
This method gives you more flexibility in scheduling tasks than the version in Spell.
schedule(int, Method, Object...) - Method in class aor.spells.Spell
Schedules a delayed task using the spells scheduler.
schedule(int, Object...) - Method in class aor.spells.Spell
the same as the other schedule, except it calls the default run method, instead of a passed method.
Scheduler - Class in aor.spells
This class controls all scheduling for Spells.
Scheduler() - Constructor for class aor.spells.Scheduler
 
Spell - Class in aor.spells
This is the class that all spells must extend.

spellCast(SpellCastEvent) - Method in class aor.spells.Spells
 
Spells - Class in aor.spells
The main plugin class! Spells really shouldn't do anything with this, except perhaps using the Logger (log)
Spells() - Constructor for class aor.spells.Spells
 
SpellSet - Class in aor.spells
This class should be extended to allow multiple spells to be put in one jar file, with the class extending spellset not being in a package and having the same name as the jar.
SpellSet() - Constructor for class aor.spells.SpellSet
 
SpellUtils - Class in aor.spells
This class contains a bunch of useful helper methods that make spell creation easier
